meanings.definition: Make a loud, unpleasant noise that continues for a long time.
meanings.sent1: The construction work dinned in my ears all day long.
meanings.sent2: The thunder dinned through the night, keeping me awake.
meanings.sent3: The noisy parrot dinned away, mimicking every sound it heard.
meanings.sent4: The alarm clock dinned like a persistent drumbeat, urging me to wake up.
meanings.sent5: The sirens dinned in the distance, signaling an approaching emergency.

meanings.definition: Repeatedly tell someone something in a forceful and insistent way.
meanings.sent1: She dinned the importance of punctuality into her students.
meanings.sent2: The salesperson dinned the benefits of the product to every customer.
meanings.sent3: He dinned his favorite joke to anyone who would listen, always getting a laugh.
meanings.sent4: The coach dinned the team's strategy into the players' minds before the big game.
meanings.sent5: The parent dinned the rules of safety into the child's mind, ensuring they understood.
